amendment.description: To sunset the reporting requirement after 7 years.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3296 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3296 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Johnson. (consideration: CR S755; text: CR S755) To sunset the reporting requirement after 7 years.
